wissayi20 loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliye eeye mirpurhidi pawathi dewani kotase tharagawalin jayagrahana himikara ganimata pakisthanaya ha indiyawa samathwiya.eeye paswaruwe pawathi tharagayen pakisthanaya hamuwe ostreliyawa lakunu 16kin parajayata pathwu athara rathriye pawathi tharagayen batahira indiya kodew pilata erehiwa kadulu 7ka jayak indiyawata himiwiya.umar akmalge wishishta pithiharambaaya hethuwen eeye ostreliyawa samaga pawathi tharagaye palamuwa panduwata paharadun pakisthanaya kadulu 5kata lakunu 191k raskirimata samathwiya.umar akmal pandu 54kin lakunu 94k raskale hathare pahara 9k ha haye pahara 4k samagini.

senasuru sikuru sahabudha yana dasha gatha karanawa nam ithama subha wasarak bawata me wasara obata path kara ganna puluwan mina lagnayen upan obe lagnadhipathi guru, sandu ha ekwa 03 wannehi da rawi/ agaharu / sikuru ha kethu samagin 02 wannehi da nicha budha lagna bhawayeda shani/ rahu samaga 08 wannehi da gaman karana mohothe obata nawa wasara uda weyi.
namuth rate janadhipathiwarayage pradhanathwayen pawathwena deshaye sahithya sammana ulela mese yata watunu kehelgedi lellak tharamatawath watina bawak lanka janamadhyawalata penune natha.
akuru waradi hadannata welawa naha.
